name: draft-js-markless-plugin
description: A plugin for draft-js that allows you to create an WYSIWYG editor that supports Markdown-like keybinding.
author: Ryo Nakamura <r7kamura@gmail.com> (https://github.com/r7kamura)

scripts.build: npm run build:rm && npm run build:mkdir && npm run build:js && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:demo: rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && cp demo/index.html docs && browserify demo/application.js -t babelify -o docs/application.js && npm run build:sass
scripts.lint: npm run lint:fixpack && npm run lint:eslint
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch:js & npm run watch:demo
